roleset.name: to speak quickly and excitedly
roleset.note: BURBLE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'burble' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from burble.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` [For a woman whose period [*T*-487] is late , [*]using RU-486 means no waiting , no walking past picket lines at abortion clinics , and no feet up in stirrups for surgery]*-1 , '' burbles [*-1] health writer Laura Fraser .
